subject: Re: Question for Coletta....
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
On the newer 12-469 it's the pin marked "VT".

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ourobouros2k2" <ourobouros2k2@...> 
wrote:
>
> I have seen on your blog where you allude to the ability to apply 
> external tuning voltage to a specific pin for either rvg or linear 
> external tuning "modules" for the 12-469. I have a linear scan 
circuit 
> that varies output voltage 1-8 volts by a 50k pot. I am very new at 
> this, but later today I am hoping to have it working on the 
> breadboard, I just need a candidate radio to  apply it to. I was 
> wondering which pin in particular it was. I don't have my 469 anymore 
> so I cant look at it, and all online pics are too small. I appreciate 
> any help.
> 
> 
> thanks
> Andy
>
